title: Cure AI
description: Cure AI streamlines scientific research workflows with AI-generated answers and seamless navigation through PubMed’s 26 million articles. Our evidence ranking system prioritizes journal quality, citations, and query relevance. Advanced filters help you customize searches to find the most reliable, relevant studies effortlessly. Whether you’re a researcher, student, or healthcare professional, Cure AI ensures you uncover high quality evidence efficiently and transparently.
